summary: Documentary chronicaling the rise and fall of the punk movement with rare interview footage of Sid Vicious and Nancy Spungen. Also concert and news footage.
cast: Stiv Bators|Terry Chimes|The Clash|Paul Cook|The Dead Boys|Generation X|Jonathan Guinness|Topper Headon|Tony James|Mick Jones|Steve Jones|John Lydon|Glen Matlock|Gene October|Augustus Pablo|Bernard Brooke Partridge|Sex Pistols|Rich Kids|Heidi Robinson|Sham 69|Paul Simonon|Nancy Spungen|Joe Strummer|Terry Sylvester|Terry and the Idiots|Sid Vicious|Mary Whitehouse|X-Ray Spex|Rick Clark|Billy Idol
keywords: acronym in title|england|briton abroad|concert tour|rock band
title: D.O.A.
